text: Don Cupitt (22 May 1934 â€“ 18 January 2025) was an English philosopher and academic. He had been an Anglican priest and a lecturer in the University of Cambridge. Cupitt died at a hospital in Cambridge, England following a short illness on 18 January 2025, at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2025 deaths Category:English philosophers Category:English theologians Category:Writers from Lancashire
title: Don Cupitt
